confirmpopup.title: ConfirmPopup
confirmpopup.subtitle: Confirmation popup component for requesting user action confirmation with customization and positioning support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard confirmation popup with message and "Yes" and "No" buttons. Opens by clicking the trigger element via `trigger` slot

placement.title: Positioning
placement.description: Popup can be positioned relative to trigger element in four directions: `top`, `bottom`, `left`, `right`. Alignment is controlled by `align` property (`start`, `center`, `end`)

controlled.title: Controlled State
controlled.description: Control popup visibility via `show` property (v-model:show). Allows programmatically opening/closing and using `rootEl` to specify trigger element

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Customize appearance: icon via `icon`, icon color via `iconColor`, button texts via `confirmText`/`cancelText`, button styles via `confirmVariant`/`cancelVariant` and palettes via `confirmSeverity`/`cancelSeverity`

template.title: Custom Template
template.description: Using `default` slot for custom content and `actions` slot for custom action buttons. `actions` slot receives `confirm` (confirm function) and `cancel` (cancel function) for full control

argTypes.message: Confirmation message text displayed in popup
argTypes.icon: Vue component icon displayed next to message
argTypes.iconColor: Icon color (CSS color in any format)
argTypes.rootEl: Element relative to which popup is positioned (HTMLElement or Vue component)
argTypes.placement: Popup position relative to element: bottom, top, left, right
argTypes.trigger: Popup opening method: click or hover
argTypes.offset: Spacing in pixels between trigger element and popup
argTypes.sameWidth: Set popup width equal to trigger element width
argTypes.boundaryPadding: Padding in pixels from viewport bounds to prevent overflow
argTypes.zIndex: Z-index for popup (used to control stacking order)
argTypes.maxHeight: Maximum popup height in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum popup width in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.teleportTo: Selector or element to which popup is teleported (default "body", false - no teleport)
argTypes.restoreFocus: Restore focus to trigger element after popup closes
argTypes.animation: Type of appearance/disappearance animation: zoom or opacity
argTypes.arrow: Show arrow pointing to trigger element
argTypes.showDelay: Delay in milliseconds before showing popup (for trigger="hover")
argTypes.hideDelay: Delay in milliseconds before hiding popup (for trigger="hover")
argTypes.durationEnter: Duration of appearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.durationLeave: Duration of disappearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.confirmSeverity: Confirm button color palette: primary, secondary, contrast
argTypes.cancelSeverity: Cancel button color palette: primary, secondary, contrast
argTypes.confirmVariant: Confirm button style variant: filled, outlined, text
argTypes.cancelVariant: Cancel button style variant: filled, outlined, text
argTypes.confirm: Event fired when confirm button is clicked
argTypes.cancel: Event fired when cancel button is clicked
argTypes.hide: Event fired when popup is hidden
argTypes.show: Event fired when popup is shown
argTypes.default: Slot for custom popup content (instead of message)
argTypes.actions: Slot for custom action buttons. Receives parameters: confirm (confirm function), cancel (cancel function)
argTypes.trigger: Slot for custom trigger element. Receives parameters: isOpen (state), open (open), close (close)
